description: Explore the potential downsides of the Apache License for software development, including issues with copyleft protection, dependency management, patent protection, and the enablement of proprietary software. Understand why some developers might prefer alternative open-source licenses that align better with their project goals and philosophies.
keywords: Apache License, software development, open-source licenses, copyleft protection, dependency management, patent protection, proprietary software, GPL, AGPL, ASF, licensing framework
title: Understanding the Downsides of the Apache License for Software Development
